attributes.action: grant the Human Right to life to those whose arms have been laid down - not to fighters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is absurd that an army should claim the right to life in a situation where it takes up arms to remove that right from others.
Nuclear logic and birth control against contributing factors to conflict remain to cast all alive within the theatre of the present their own degree of guilt against the commandment 'thou shalt not kill'.
A military with robots who do not kill but disarm is that we would wish to argue for - but that we consider fighting for that an inefficient distraction.
The whole idea of an army is of an animal's sense, below the higher aspirations of humanity.

rejection.details: Please rephrase the title of your petition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
